title: Exquisite Floral Cascade Jhumka
features: Delicate Floral Cascade Design. Features a stunning floral silhouette, meticulously crafted with a pavé diamond setting for maximum brilliance. Adorned with elegant pink tourmaline stones, providing a subtle yet eye-catching color contrast. Secure and comfortable post and clip closure. Modern adaptation of the traditional Jhumka style, perfect for the contemporary woman.
occasions: and special occasions where you want to make a statement. Can be paired with both traditional Indian attire and modern evening wear.
description: Expertly crafted with high-quality materials and attention to detail. The floral design is feminine and timeless. The combination of rose gold, diamonds, and pink tourmaline creates a luxurious and sophisticated look. The earrings are lightweight and comfortable to wear, making them perfect for all-day events.
